MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G69 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Muirhead and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7:00pm to safely complete repair works on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:46pm on Tuesday, 30 March 2021
